title: This Website
description: I wanted to create a place to house all of the things that I've created and written, so I used my web design knowledge gained from a summer internship to create this site.

title: Tarot Card Reader
description: A simple web application where you can draw tarot cards in several spreads.  Card descriptions included.

title: Missile Defender
description: A game made in Unity where you defend against missiles.  Based on the classic Missile Command.

title: Writing Analysis
description: A simple Python script that counts the percentage of words that are inclosed in quotes.  I created this to analyze the frequency of dialogue in my writing.
